You lift up the lid of the chest. You are able to remove the heavy stone lid of the chest. Inside is a small wood box with similar carvings on it. You lift the small box out of the chest and carefully open it. Inside is a moederately large piece of paper, rolled up and tied with a red ribbon.

You untie the ribbon and unroll the paper. The paper feels old and has a sweet scent to it. You hold out the paper to see what is on it. On the paper is a strangely drewn map, leading to an 'X' somewhere up in the mountains. And, it doesn't look too far away.

Go to the 'X'Head back home
